1.verse: And Jehovah called unto Moses, and spake unto him out of the tent of meeting, saying,
And when any one offereth an oblation of a meal-offering unto Jehovah, his oblation shall be of fine flour; and he shall pour oil upon it, and put frankincense thereon:
And if his oblation be a sacrifice of peace-offerings; if he offer of the herd, whether male or female, he shall offer it without blemish before Jehovah.
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And if any one sin, in that he heareth the voice of adjuration, he being a witness, whether he hath seen or known, if he do not utter it , then he shall bear his iniquity.
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And this is the law of the trespass-offering: it is most holy.
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And it came to pass on the eighth day, that Moses called Aaron and his sons, and the elders of Israel;
And Nadab and Abihu, the sons of Aaron, took each of them his censer, and put fire therein, and laid incense thereon, and offered strange fire before Jehovah, which he had not commanded them.
And Jehovah spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying unto them,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, after the death of the two sons of Aaron, when they drew near before Jehovah, and died;
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah said unto Moses, Speak unto the priests, the sons of Aaron, and say unto them, There shall none defile himself for the dead among his people;
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
And Jehovah spake unto Moses in mount Sinai, saying,
Ye shall make you no idols, neither shall ye rear you up a graven image, or a pillar, neither shall ye place any figured stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am Jehovah your God.
And Jehovah spake unto Moses, saying,
